messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Need help unschooling food...Now, kids clothes size
messages.msgSnippet: My kids ( except for JP, hes a skinny fella)  all had to start wearing huskies ( for boys) and Anna had to wear Pretty Plus or Extra Special sizes. These
messages.messageBody:
My kids ( except for JP, hes a skinny fella) all had to start wearing
huskies ( for boys) and Anna had to wear Pretty Plus or Extra Special sizes.
These special sizes ARE hard to find.. and the selection is pathetic ( esp
for girls) Anna is 13 and now she is in the very top end of girls plus
sizes.. 18 1/2. She can also wear ladies size 14.. but, like others have
said.. they dont fit right.. they are too long( the pants, I mean.. shirts
are usually OK). I have TONS, I mean LOADS of girls plus sized clothes if
anyone is interested I have size 10 1/2 up to 16 1/2. I know this is not a
"for sale" list.. but, since a few folks have mentioned it, I thought it
might help if anyone is looking for some special sizes for girls.

Teresa


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
